content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, it's a newly built unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. The location is perfect, close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. Now, let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for the highest possible price, so feel free to make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the information, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate the fact that you have a newly built apartment in the city center. It sounds like an excellent location. Regarding the rental price, I'm currently a student, and I'm looking to find the best deal possible. I'm smart, dependable, and responsible, and I always follow moral and ethical standards. My goal is to maintain a good relationship with my landlord. With that in mind, I'm willing to offer 600 Euro per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price considering the current market and my financial situation as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your offer, Maryam. However, I'm looking for a higher price. Remember, this is a newly built apartment in the city center, and the location is perfect. I believe the value of the apartment is much higher than your offer. Why don't you reconsider your offer and come back to me with a higher price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your perspective, Mister Schmidt. The location and condition of the apartment are certainly attractive features. As a student, I'm on a tight budget, but I'm also aware of the importance of finding a place that meets my needs. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I must remain within my budget. I'm prepared to offer 650 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair balance between your expectations and my financial constraints. I hope this new offer is more acceptable to you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your effort to increase your offer, but 650 Euro still doesn't meet my expectations for this apartment. The location and condition of the apartment are exceptional, and I believe it deserves a higher price. I recommend reconsidering your offer once more and coming back to me with a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for a higher price, Mister Schmidt. Let me see if I can adjust my offer. I'm currently a student, and I'm trying to find a balance between the quality of the apartment and my financial capabilities. I'm willing to offer 700 Euro per month for the apartment. This is my final offer, as I'm trying to stay within my budget while also taking into account the value of the apartment. I hope this offer meets your expectations.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Maryam, I appreciate your effort to reach a higher price. Your final offer of 700 Euro per month is much closer to my expectations for this apartment. However, I believe the apartment's exceptional location and condition still warrant a higher price. As a final offer, I would accept 800 Euro per month. This is my final counteroffer, and I believe it is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your counteroffer of 800 Euro per month is quite high, and it exceeds my budget as a student. I've already stretched my offer to the limit based on my financial situation. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment, I must remain realistic about what I can afford. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept your counteroffer. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for me to afford as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, Maryam. I'm sorry that we couldn't find a price that works for both of us. I wish you the best of luck in finding a suitable apartment that fits your budget. Let's terminate our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, and I'm sorry that we couldn't reach an agreement. I will continue my search for an apartment that fits within my budget. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
